::Orchestra/Triggerhappy/Skullgrin::

        Orchestra nods.

        "Yes=
!  Let's go to Zone 5!" He said, ready to scrap any bot around.
~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Triggerhappy ran out and got Blowp=
ipe, Blowpipe detransformed into Triggerhappy's compressed air cannon.  Tri=
ggerhappy looked up at Menasor.

         "Yes!  With their gestalt warrior=
, and Beastbox and Squalktalk soon-to-be merging into Squalkbox, we will be=
 invincible!!!  Almost...." He said.

         Triggerhappy then noticed an=
other one of his allies.  He ran over to Skullgrin.

          "Hey!!  Hmm,=
 isn't there somebody who can transform into a Pretender??" Triggerhappy sa=
id, trying to hint Skullgrin.  
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=

       Skullgrin nodded.

       "Hahaha!  I'm surprised I didn't think of=
 that!" He exclaimed.

       Skullgrin transformed to robot mode, then, he=
 began a transformation.  He transformed into Pretender mode, and had his d=
ouble slagmaker laser ready to be used on something.  In Pretender mode, he=
 was 12 feet tall and had brute strength, but his intelligence dropped grea=
tly.  He fired 2 rounds from his deadly slagmaker(I like calling it the sla=
gmaker ok?) at Hot Rod.
